People not Properties use the services that our Council Taxes support.

The current tax regieme is unfair.

We currently can have a single person (retired) living in a large house, paying more council tax than a family of 2 adults and 2 working siblings living in a smaller house.

Where is the fairness in this system ?.

People use council services NOT properties.

Changing the current system so that the tax needs are divided amongst working people, will give us a fairer more accountable system.

I urge you to force the goverment to change.
